summary: This module provides a set of typed data models for the backend, covering user prompt specifications, chat configuration options, pagination metadata, and generic paginated responses, along with utilities for dictionaryâ€‘based serialization and deserialization.
business_intent: Standardize and simplify the exchange of structured data between the frontend and backend of the chat system, ensuring type safety, validation, and consistent handling of prompts, profiles, starters, and paginated API results.
